markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gripping Limbs](/Feats.aspx?ID=2528) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Nodules, hooks, or claws on your limbs allow you to cling to surfaces with ease. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.
name: Gripping Limbs
